Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • Bot

  • public class Bot
extends Player
    The bot has a hand and four unique play card methods based on the number of cards in the current middle pile. It uses strategy and intelligence based on memory of previous cards played and current cards in its hand in order to determine the smartest card to play in that situation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bot()
      Default constructor, calls Player's constructor
      Bot(java.lang.String name)
      Calls Player's constructor and passes in a name

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card playCard(java.util.ArrayList<Card> list)
      Play card takes in the cards already in the middle pile, and plays a smart, legal card, based on the other cards player.
      Card playCard0()
      Bot plays a card when the middle pile is empty
      Card playCard1(Card card1)
      Bot plays a card when there is one in the middle pile.
      Card playCard2(Card card1, Card card2)
      Bot plays a card when there are two in the middle pile
      Card playCard3(Card card1, Card card2, Card card3)
      Bot plays a card when there are three in the middle pile

        getHand, getName, getTricksBid, getTricksTaken, getTurnToPlay, incrementTricksTaken, setHand, setName, setTricksBid, setTricksTaken, setTurnToPlay

    • Method Detail

      • playCard

        public Card playCard(java.util.ArrayList<Card> list)
        Play card takes in the cards already in the middle pile, and plays a smart, legal card, based on the other cards player.
        Parameters:
        list - the middle pile (cards already played)
        Returns:
        The played bot card

      • playCard0

        public Card playCard0()
        Bot plays a card when the middle pile is empty
        Returns:
        Legal card from bot's hand.

      • playCard1

        public Card playCard1(Card card1)
        Bot plays a card when there is one in the middle pile.
        Parameters:
        card1 - The first card in the middle pile, the card led by the first player
        Returns:
        Legal card from bot's hand.

      • playCard2

        public Card playCard2(Card card1,
                      Card card2)
        Bot plays a card when there are two in the middle pile
        Parameters:
        card1 - The first card in the middle pile, the card led by the first player
        card2 - The second card in the middle pile, the card played second in the round
        Returns:
        Legal card from bot's hand

      • playCard3

        public Card playCard3(Card card1,
                      Card card2,
                      Card card3)
        Bot plays a card when there are three in the middle pile
        Parameters:
        card1 - The first card in the middle pile, the card led by the first player
        card2 - The second card in the middle pile, the card played second in the round
        card3 - The third card in the middle pile, the card played third in the round
        Returns:
        Legal card from bot's hand
